'''21w14a''' is the sixteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.17]], released on April 7, 2021,<ref>{{snap|21w14a|April 7, 2021}}</ref> which adds raw metals and the ability to wax oxidized copper and cut copper, and fixes some bugs and crashes.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''{{Animate|Oxidized Copper Block JE1 BE1.png; Oxidized Cut Copper JE1 BE1.png; Oxidized Cut Copper Slab JE1 BE1.png; Oxidized Cut Copper Stairs (N) JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Block of Copper|Blocks of Copper]]'''
* Added waxed variants of oxidized copper, cut copper, and their variants.

=== Items ===
'''{{Animate|Raw Copper JE1.png; Raw Iron JE1.png; Raw Gold JE1.png|32px}} [[Raw Metal]]'''
* Added [[raw iron]], [[raw copper]] and [[raw gold]].
** Allows [[Fortune]] to have an effect on these ores.
** Drop from their respective [[ore]].
*** The ores can still be obtained with [[Silk Touch]].
** Can be smelted into an ingot.
** [[Piglin]]s attempt to pick up raw gold.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added waxed oxidized cut copper stairs and slabs to the <code>stairs</code> and <code>slabs</code> block and item tags, respectively.
* Added raw gold to the <code>piglin_loved</code> item tag.
